text: Is there a graph type in the ecosystem that has a dense weight matrix?

elements.text: Is there a graph type in the ecosystem that has a dense weight matrix?

text:
defining your own should be fairly easy. An outdated inspiration would be:

by <@U6S2GUM43> which is more active
